trans-unit.source: Multi and share interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 多重和共享界面。

trans-unit.source: Although not an official support venue, Stack Overflow has been popular with some PycURL users.
trans-unit.target: 尽管不是官方的支持场所，但是Stack Overflow在某些PycURL用户中很受欢迎。

trans-unit.source: Bugs can be reported via GitHub. Please use GitHub only for bug reports and direct questions to our mailing list instead.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过GitHub报告错误。请仅将GitHub用于错误报告，并将问题直接发送到我们的邮件列表。

trans-unit.source: Documentation
trans-unit.target: 文件资料

trans-unit.source: Documentation for the most recent PycURL release is available on PycURL website.
trans-unit.target: 最新的PycURL版本的文档可在PycURL网站上找到。

trans-unit.source: Download source and binary distributions from PyPI or Bintray. Binary wheels are now available for 32 and 64 bit Windows versions.
trans-unit.target: 从PyPI或Bintray下载源代码和二进制发行版。现在，二进制轮子可用于32和64位Windows版本。

trans-unit.source: Features including multiple protocol support, SSL, authentication and proxy options. PycURL supports most of libcurl’s callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 功能包括多种协议支持，SSL，身份验证和代理选项。PycURL支持大多数libcurl的回调。

trans-unit.source: For support questions please use curl-and-python mailing list. Mailing list archives are available for your perusal as well.
trans-unit.target: 有关支持问题，请使用curl-and-python邮件列表。您也可以阅读邮件列表档案。

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: License
trans-unit.target: 许可证

trans-unit.source: Please see the installation documentation for installation instructions.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅安装文档以获取安装说明。

trans-unit.source: PycURL -- A Python Interface To The cURL library
trans-unit.target: PycURL --一个指向cURL库的Python接口。

trans-unit.source: PycURL is a Python interface to libcurl, the multiprotocol file transfer library. Similarly to the urllib Python module, PycURL can be used to fetch objects identified by a URL from a Python program. Beyond simple fetches however PycURL exposes most of the functionality of libcurl, including:
trans-unit.target: PycURL是libcurl（多协议文件传输库）的Python接口。与urllib Python模块类似，PycURL可用于从Python程序中获取URL标识的对象。除了简单的获取之外，PycURL还提供了libcurl的大多数功能，包括：

trans-unit.source: PycURL is dual licensed under the LGPL and an MIT/X derivative license based on the libcurl license. The complete text of the licenses is available in COPYING-LGPL and COPYING-MIT files in the source distribution.
trans-unit.target: PycURL在LGPL和基于libcurl许可证的MIT / X衍生许可证下具有双重许可。许可证的全文可在源发行版的COPYING-LGPL和COPYING-MIT文件中找到。

trans-unit.source: Python 2.7 or 3.4 through 3.6.
trans-unit.target: Python 2.7或3.4至3.6。

trans-unit.source: Requirements
trans-unit.target: 所需经费

trans-unit.source: Sockets used for network operations, permitting integration of PycURL into the application’s I/O loop (e.g., using Tornado).
trans-unit.target: 用于网络操作的套接字，允许将PycURL集成到应用程序的I / O循环中（例如，使用Tornado）。

trans-unit.source: Speed - libcurl is very fast and PycURL, being a thin wrapper above libcurl, is very fast as well. PycURL was benchmarked to be several times faster than requests.
trans-unit.target: 速度-libcurl非常快，PycURL作为libcurl之上的瘦包装，也非常快。PycURL的基准测试速度比请求快几倍。

trans-unit.source: Support
trans-unit.target: 技术支持

trans-unit.source: libcurl 7.19.0 or better.
trans-unit.target: libcurl 7.19.0或更高版本。
